entry.title: UDP Summary
entry.content:
1 Summary

UDP(User Datagram Protocol) is a regular and simple protocol of the transport layer. It offers service of transmitting messages between applications.

2 Format

2.1 UDP Header

Field Meaning
Source Port The transport port of sending process
Destination Port The transport port of the destination of the message
Length Length in octets of of this datagram including header and data
checksum the 16-bit one’s complement of the one’s complement sum of a pseudo header

entry.title: README
entry.content: After entering an automotive company, I suddenly started to work on the R&D of automotive Ethernet as a fresh graduate major in machinery. I’ve learned a lot from some awesome people in the Internet. One year after my induction, I’d like to share something I’v learned and discuss with you to improve each other.
